name: HelpFormatter_printUsageTest
description: Unit tests for the printUsage method of the HelpFormatter class.

test_cases.name: testPrintUsageWithSingleOption
test_cases.description: Tests the printUsage method with a single option.

test_cases.name: testPrintUsageWithOptionGroup
test_cases.description: Tests the printUsage method with an option group.

test_cases.name: testPrintUsageWithOptionComparator
test_cases.description: Tests the printUsage method with options that have a comparator.
